Class Treasure

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Treasure

public class Treasure
extends greenfoot.Actor

Creates a treasure chest that gets spawned in the world. It will follow the diver if they are touching.

Version:
March 19, 2014
Author:
Terrence Hung

Constructor Summary
Treasure()
          Constructs a treasure chest that will be spawned in the world.
 
Method Summary
 void act()
          Make the treasure chest follow the diver if they are in contact, and remove it from the world when it reaches the edge.
